content: 7 5 8 8 8 5 9 9 9 5 inches 19 20 20 22 23 23 24 cm end with ws row bind off back panel attach yarn and k the next 72 80 88 96 104 112 124 stitches for back panel turn and p back then work stst on these stitches for 7 5 8 8 8 5 9 9 9 5 inches 19 20 20 22 23 23 24 cm end with ws row bind off 28 32 36 40 44 48 54 stitches place locking stitch marker then bind off 16 stitches and place another locking stitch marker then bind off remaining stitches the 16 stitches between the stitch markers are the back neck stitches that will be picked up for front and neck band left front panel attach yarn and work the remaining left front stitches the same as right front ending with ws row bind off attaching front and back with right sides facing seam the front panels to the back at the shoulders using your preferred seaming method leaving the center neck stitches for the band pick up sleeves using larger 16 inch circular needle or dpns or magic loop and starting at underarm place a bor marker and pick up 58 62 66 70 74 78 82 stitches and k 13 14 14 14 5 15 15 15 inches 33 36 36 37 38 38 38 cm for xl 2xl and 3xl sizes - start decreasing when sleeve length is approximately to elbow length k2tog before and after bor marker every 6th round until decrease round for the cuff decrease round before changing to garter stitch ribbing for the cuff - *k2tog* change to k one round p one round for garter stitch cuff for 2 inches 5 cm bind off loosely collar and front ribbing starting at left bottom rib puk 3 of every 4 stitches of left front then puk every stitch across back then puk 3 of every 4 down right side k every row for 3 inches for garter stitch ribbing bind off loosely weave in ends wet block to desired measurements and enjoy for pattern support please contact me at jsrn1398@yahoo com you can #tag me @jsrn1398 on instagram and find me on ravelry @nursesandy77 and sandy sessler designs follow me on youtube @ knitting nana goes rogue schematic block to finished dimensions or as desired bust circumference - 36 41 45 50 55 59 66 inches 91 104 114 127 140 150 167 cm shoulder to to bottom of hem length - 20 21 21 22 23 23 24 inches 51 53 53 56 58 58 61 cm sleeve length to top of cuff - k 13 14 14 14 5 15 15 15 inches 33 36 36 37 38 38 38 cm cuff length - 2 inches 5cm
